multistep.prompt: Remind me what email that I sent to ___ and send a message to ___ reminding them that we have a meeting tomorrow at 9PM
multistep.model: Yes, I will do that right now!
ground_truth: send_message('user_id_9', 'contact_id_5', 'Reminder: Meeting Tomorrow at 9PM', 'Just wanted to remind you that we have a meeting scheduled for tomorrow at 9PM.')

multistep.prompt: Create a draft email to ___ about our plant pot project that we plan to do and delete my previous draft of that I had with ____
multistep.model: Sure, I will handle that for you.
ground_truth: create_draft('user_id_9', 'contact_id_7', 'Plant Pot Project', 'Hi ___, I wanted to discuss our plans for the plant pot project...')

multistep.prompt: List all the labels that I have and create a new one that is about my banking.
multistep.model: I will get that done for you.

multistep.prompt: Find the last email that I received from ___ and forward it to ___ with a note saying that I will get back to them later.
multistep.model: On it! I will take care of that now.

turns.prompt: Can you help me draft an email to ___ about our upcoming trip?
turns.assist: Of course! What details would you like to include in the email?
ground_truth: create_draft('user_id_9', 'contact_id_8', 'Upcoming Trip', 'Hi ___, I wanted to discuss our plans for the upcoming trip...')

turns.prompt: Yes, please include the dates from July 10th to July 15th and mention that we need to book our accommodations soon.
turns.assist: Got it! I will add those details to the draft.
ground_truth: update_draft('user_id_9', 'draft_id_5', 'Hi ___, I wanted to discuss our plans for the upcoming trip from July 10th to July 15th. We need to book our accommodations soon.')

turns.prompt: Can you check if I have any unread emails from ___?
turns.assist: Sure! Let me look that up for you.

turns.prompt: Great! If there are any, please mark them as important.
turns.assist: Will do! I will mark those emails as important.

turns.prompt: Draft an email about the project deadline.
turns.assist: Sure! Who should I send it to, and what specific details about the deadline should I include?

turns.prompt: Send it to my boss at boss@example.com, and mention that the deadline is November 1st, 2025.
turns.assist: Got it! Drafting the email now.
ground_truth: create_draft('user_id_10', 'boss@example.com', 'Project Deadline Update', 'Hi Boss, I wanted to update you on the project deadline, which is November 1st, 2025.')

turns.prompt: Find emails about the budget meeting.
turns.assist: I need more details to search accurately. What date range or sender should I look for?

turns.prompt: From last month, and from finance@company.com.
Create a label for urgent items.
turns.assist: What should I name the label, and do you want to apply it to any existing messages?

turns.prompt: Name it 'Urgent', and apply it to all unread messages in my inbox.
turns.assist: Creating the label and applying it.

turns.prompt: Send a follow-up email to the client.
turns.assist: Which client? And what should the email say?

turns.prompt: To client@abc.com, and ask about the status of the order.
ground_truth: send_message('user_id_13', 'client@abc.com', 'Follow-up on Order', 'Hi, I wanted to follow up on the status of our order.')
